GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15 to before v5.15.6
GSD.description:
iommu/vt-d: Fix unmap_pages support

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.6 by commit 724ee060d0aba28f072fc7357a20366b0a519593, it was introduced in version v5.15 by commit 3f34f125977685e591def32984c77e23a86075b0. For more details please see the references link.
